actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 104(g) of title 23, United States Code, relating to the transfer of funds from the rail-crossing program to other uses.

summary.text: Provides that all or any portion of the amount apportioned to any State in accordance with the rail- highway crossings program of the Highways Safety Act of 1973 may be transferred to other highway safety programs if such State has no rail-highway crossings on its Federal-aid highway system.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 104(g) of title 23, United States Code, relating to the transfer of funds from the rail-crossing program to other uses.
